actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to revise the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974.
short_title: Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act Amendments

summary.text: Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act Amendments - Repeals provisions of the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act: (1) relating to development of a standard form for the statement of settlement costs in all transactions involving federally related mortgage loans; (2) requiring advance disclosure of settlement costs to prospective borrowers; and (3) requiring the disclosure of the previous selling price of existing real property.

titles.title: Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act Amendments
A bill to revise the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974.
